professional_summary: Experienced Oracle DBA with expertise in SQL Server and database management, emphasizing performance tuning, replication monitoring, and advanced security configurations.

key_responsibilities: Administering Oracle and SQL Server databases across multiple platforms including RAC
and Explain Plan for optimal database operations.
Monitoring and troubleshooting Golden Gate replication processes and scripting custom monitoring solutions.
Conducting database migrations from legacy systems to modern Oracle and SQL Server environments.
Optimizing database performance through index rebuilding and schema reorganization using Data Pump and conventional exports.
Configuring advanced security features including Transparent Data Encryption and Redaction policies.
